shortForecast: Chance Freezing Rain then Patchy Fog
name: Today
detailedForecast: A chance of rain and patchy fog before 8am, then patchy freezing fog between 8am and 9am, then a chance of freezing rain and patchy freezing fog between 9am and 10am, then a chance of freezing rain and patchy fog between 10am and 11am, then a chance of freezing rain and a chance of rain and patchy fog between 11am and noon, then patchy fog and a slight chance of freezing rain. Cloudy, with a high near 36. Northwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.
